org.apache.solr.core

Class ConfigSetService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.core.ConfigSetService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CloudConfigSetService, ConfigSetService.Default

    public abstract class ConfigSetService
extends Object
    Service class used by the CoreContainer to load ConfigSets for use in SolrCore creation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ConfigSetService.Default
      The default ConfigSetService.
      static class  ConfigSetService.SchemaCaching
      A ConfigSetService that shares schema objects between cores
